title: Bug 17758[Navigator] Navigator View. Problems with 'Go Into' action
description: Bug 17758[Navigator] Navigator View. Problems with 'Go Into' action
OB: After performing 'Go Into' action multiple times in the Navigator View, the forward navigation becomes problematic.
EB: Expected behavior is that forward navigation should consistently work without leading to a blank screen.
SR:
1. Start with a clean F1 build.
2. Import all plugins from the runtime environment to load some projects.
3. Pack a project (e.g., org.eclipse.ant).
4. Perform 'Go Into', 'Go Up', 'Go Back', 'Go Back' - this should work fine.
5. Close the project.
6. Notice that forward navigation is still enabled, but the first forward goes to a blank screen.
7. Click forward, then click back to reproduce the issue.
